title: Bloomberg Markets: Foot Locker Investors Face `Years of Pain'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Foot Locker Investors Face `Years of Pain'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Matthew Townsend Global Business Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Foot Locker Inc. suffering its worst stock decline since the depths of the last recession after a bleak outlook renewed concerns that the industry’s growth streak has come to an end.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
